item.title: Analtyical Reasoning with 'What If' Scenarios
item.description: One of the most insightful blogs I’ve ever read was Tim Vieira’s post on “Counterfactual Reasoning and Learning from Logged Data”; I highly recommend it to anyone interested in reinforcement learning and policy optimization techniques. That said, with this post here, I hope to distill some wisdom that analyst and app developers can use to improve their platform’s engagement. For those unfamiliar with the concept of counterfactuals, you can think of them as data that would have arisen under an alternative scenario i.
